p: It is anticipated that 32 eligible patients will be recruited over 2 years. All participants will be followed until death or study completion. The study will be considered closed after all patients had a minimum of 2 years of follow-up or died. It is anticipated that this study will run for approximately 4 years. Participants who do not commence SRT within 28 days of enrolment will be replaced until 32 patients commence SRT.
